title: Does what it says
comment: Works, but I wish I could set it to automatically send packets at certain intervals and log wether it gets a reply or not...

title: Love It!!
comment: Great app. Does exactly what I needed.

title: Awesome
comment: The software is awesome. Thank you. One question: can you please implement the possibility to import/export the defined packets from pc version to the mobile one. That would be great and could save the time to manually replicate them.  Thank you very much one more time
